MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  Our engineers are now working on the fault and we hope to have your electricity restored by 15-JAN-2021 00:00.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: There is a power cut in the L8 postcode area of Liverpool, affecting properties in North Hill Street, Barkis Close and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 3.49PM. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the work required to repair a fault on our underground cable network and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by Midnight. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8.35PM on 14th January 2021.
